You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENHANCE YOUR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH SALESFORCE FEEDBACK MANAGEMENT
Translate Surveys With Generative AI

Unlock insights from a global audience by using generative AI to translate surveys into different languages.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on
Available with the Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses

To use generative AI to translate surveys, first turn on Einstein Generative AI.

Enable AI-Generated Surveys

Allow your users to translate surveys using Generative AI.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To enable AI-Generated Surveys:	
System Administrator profile
Assign User Permissions


From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Survey, and then select Survey Settings.
Enable AI-Generated Surveys.
Define Configurations for AI-Translated Surveys

Select the settings to activate the preferences for translating surveys with Generative AI.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To define configurations for AI-Translated Surveys	
Scoring Framework Admin
Manage Natural Language Process Results


From Setup, search for and select Industries AI Setup in the Quick Find box.
Click New Use Case Configuration.
To translate surveys using generative AI, select Translation AI as the Configuration Type.
Enter a configuration label and a description.
Save the configuration.
Click Set Up and accept the terms of use.
From the dropdown, select Agree.
Save and activate the configuration.
Translate a Survey Using Generative AI

Translate surveys into different languages using generative AI, ensuring broader accessibility among diverse audiences.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To translate a survey using generative AI:	
Permissions to translate languages in the Translation Workbench
Read permission for the Survey object
Scoring Framework User
Manage Natural Language Process Results


On the record page for the activated survey that you want to translate, click the Languages tab.
Next to your chosen language, click Translate. Acknowledge the disclaimer message for Einstein.
To translate the text of an individual field, click  next to the field. To translate all texts simultaneously, click Translate Page. You can edit the translated text if you want.
Translate the survey name, pause message, survey questions, answer choices, and thank you page messages. You can translate only the text provided by the survey creator and the static merge field text.
IMPORTANT Merge field content that’s inserted based on field values from Salesforce records can’t be translated.
Save your work.

title: Translation with Generative AI in Salesforce Feedback Management
